full_summary:
Rendering Aid to Navigation Services in the Yukon Territory

## Tender Details
| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-23-01030684 |
| Solicitation Number | 30003293 |
| Publication Date | March 24, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | April 19, 2023, 14:00 (UTC-4) |
| Tender Status | Expiré (Expired) |

## Services Required
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) requires a contractor to provide Aid to Navigation services in the Yukon Territory. The contractor will be responsible for installing, removing, maintaining, and repairing buoys and beacons to ensure safe navigation on our waterways.

## General Description of Work
The contractor will be required to perform the following tasks:

* Place buoys on position in accordance with navigational season
* Maintain position and operation of buoys and beacons
* Lift/remove/change buoys as required
* Repair and reposition buoys as required

## Deliverables and MILESTONES
Within seven (7) days of Contract award, the Contractor must inspect the aids to navigation equipment and report any discrepancies/defects to the Project Authority.

## Key Deliverables
* Complete all maintenance and repair tasks as required
* Deliver buoys and beacons to a designated storage area at the end of the navigation season
